documents.document: fantastic hotel 10 out of 10 What a lovely hotel - would certainly recommend it to anyone. Rooms were lovely, just as they are on the photos. Staff were very helpful and 'smiley'. The roof top pool is just perfect... and the food is first class ........ breakfast and lunch ! I will certainly return to this hotel, thank you to everyone who looked after us.ps forgot to mention the location .......... just perfect. Sue Graham Andrew, Durham
